data.meanings: To heat, become hot or very hot, melt. Boiling water. Loyal/close friend/relative. Black smoke.
data.sentence: The word حَمِيمٍ comes from the root ح م م and is associated with the meanings: To heat, become hot or very hot, melt. Boiling water. Loyal/close friend/relative. Black smoke.

data.meanings: act of going/walking, going/walking around or otherwise, to go or wander about, circuited/compassed, journeyed, came to him, come upon, visitation, visit, approach, drew near, to go round or round about often, encompass,"the men/people/locusts filled the land like the TWF/flood/deluge", overpowering/overwhelming rain/water that covers,a servant that serves one with gentleness and carefulness,a detached/distinct part/portion, a piece or bit, a party/division/sect,a sort of raisins of which the bunches are composed of closely-compacted berries, a garment in which one goes round or circuits, a place of going round or round about.
data.sentence: The word يَطُوفُونَ comes from the root ط و ف and is associated with the meanings: act of going/walking, going/walking around or otherwise, to go or wander about, circuited/compassed, journeyed, came to him, come upon, visitation, visit, approach, drew near, to go round or round about often, encompass,"the men/people/locusts filled the land like the TWF/flood/deluge", overpowering/overwhelming rain/water that covers,a servant that serves one with gentleness and carefulness,a detached/distinct part/portion, a piece or bit, a party/division/sect,a sort of raisins of which the bunches are composed of closely-compacted berries, a garment in which one goes round or circuits, a place of going round or round about.
